title: Leavebuster is in need of some fixes?!?!
body:
Hello i don't use a lot the forum but i have to write this. I am aware that leaving the game is a bad thing and people that do it deserve a punishment. With this said i've got to say that i'm actually a leaver myself but follow me over. I have a bad computer and don't have money to buy a new one and sometimes usually once or twice a week my computer freezes and there is nothing to do but turn it off and restart it. This is probably the sixth time i get the leavebuster and this is getting really annoying because i get that people who leave the game should be punished but why should people with bad connection or these kind of problem get punished too even if they come back into the game and help the team winning. Please riot i'm really a huge fan of the game and what you do but this leavebuster system in my honest opinion needs some fixes because people that leave the game for a couple of minutes and then get back into the game should not be punished so heavily... I mean really.... a coulpe of minutes of afking for real problems and not ragequitting should not lead to hours of waiting.

Please leave a comment with what you think about the system, if you guys think it's fair or needs adjustment just to see some other opinions other than me 
With this said i'll get back to the leavebuster screen and wait my hour of punishment in silence ;( ;( 

(forgive the bad english if you find problems reading this ;D )
